name: 迴歸分析
description: This is a graduate level course designed for students that have taken at least one introductory statistics. Students will learn both linear and logistic regression models. Practical examples and homework exercises will be used to help students understand and master these methods and gain hand-on experiences.
goals: 瞭解何種實驗數據適合使用線性或邏輯迴歸進行分析並能正確的使用這些統計方法
能針對其研究主題進行設計實驗並有能力正確的驗證其研究假說
具解釋實驗目的、方法、統計分析與結論給同儕聽眾瞭解的能力
syllabus:
1.  Course Introduction 

2.  Simple Linear Regression I

3.  Simple Linear Regression II

4.  Multiple Liner Regression I

5.  Multiple Linear Regression II: Polynomial Regression Models

6.  Multiple Linear Regression III: Qualitative predictor variables

7.  Multiple Linear Regression IV: Model Selection

8.  Midterm exam

9.  Multiple Linear Regression V: Regression Diagnostics and Remedial Measures

10.Logistic Regression I

11.Logistic Regression II

12.Logistic Regression III

13.Logistic Regression IV: Multinomial Logistic Regression

14.Logistic Regression V: Ordinal Logistic Regression

15.Logistic Regression VI: Diagnostics for Logistic Regression

16.Project Presentation 1-Linear Regression

17.Project Presentation 2-Logistic Regression

18.Final Exam

methodologies.note: 使用課本、自編講義媒材授課
讓學生使用實驗室數據進行資料分析
運用數位平台與自製簡報檔案教學
